Your Path to Market Dominance

We don't guess. We use a proven 3-step framework designed specifically for the green industry to turn your territory into a lead-generating machine.

STEP 01

The Deep Dive Audit

We analyze your service area, competitors, and current web presence to find the "low hanging fruit" keywords others are missing.

STEP 02

The Custom Build

We deploy a high-performance website and set up your Google Ads campaigns targeting high-margin jobs like hardscaping & install.

STEP 03

Launch & Scale

We go live. Calls start recording. We meet monthly to review data and optimize, ensuring your cost-per-lead drops over time.

Dominating Local Search

When a homeowner in your town searches "patio installer" or "lawn care," who shows up? If it's not you, you're losing money. Our SEO foundation ensures you rank for the keywords that actually drive revenue, not just traffic.

  • Google Map Pack Optimization
  • Service Area Pages
  • Citation Building

The Content Engine

You hate writing blogs. We do it for you. We create industry-specific articles that Google loves and send automated newsletters to your past clients so they remember to book Spring Cleanups and Fall Aeration.

  • Monthly SEO Blog Posts
  • Seasonal Client Newsletters
  • Automated Review Requests

High-Intent Google Ads

Need work this week? SEO takes time, but Google Ads are instant. We run targeted campaigns specifically for high-margin jobs like Hardscaping, Lighting, and Installation. We don't waste budget on "lawn mowing" clicks unless you want volume.

  • Negative Keyword Filtering
  • High-Ticket Focusing
  • Call Tracking & Recording

Built for Conversion

We don't just make "pretty" websites. We build sales machines designed to convert visitors into booked jobs.

Common Questions

Do I own my website?

Yes, 100%. Unlike other agencies that hold your site hostage, you own the domain, the design, and the content. If you ever decide to leave, you take it with you.

Are there long-term contracts?

No. We operate on a month-to-month basis. We believe we should earn your business every month with results, not lock you into a 12-month agreement.

How long until I see results?

Google Ads produce leads almost immediately (within 48-72 hours of launch). Local SEO typically takes 3-6 months to build significant momentum, but provides the highest long-term ROI.

Do you work with other industries?

No. We specialize exclusively in the Green Industry (Landscaping, Lawn Care, Tree Service, Hardscaping). This focus allows us to know exactly what keywords work and what homeowners are looking for.

Is Ad Spend included in the price?

No, the 'Market Leader' package covers the professional management, optimization, and reporting of your campaigns. You pay Google directly for the ad clicks (Ad Spend), which gives you full control and transparency over your budget.

Do I have to write the emails/blogs?

Not at all. In the 'Authority Partner' package, we handle all the writing. We know the difference between dethatching and aerating, so the content is accurate and professional without you needing to lift a finger.

Can I upgrade my package later?

Absolutely. Many of our clients start with the 'Growth Partner' package to build their foundation and upgrade to 'Authority' or 'Market Leader' once they have the crew capacity to handle more leads.
